4212 8425 HxHPRC: Enjoy the movie and the subtitle!

35910 39330 People once believed
that when someone dies...

39414 43710 a crow carries their soul
to the land of the dead.

43793 47130 But sometimes,
something so bad happens...

47213 52469 that a terrible sadness is carried
with it and the soul can't rest.

52552 55597 Then sometimes,
just sometimes...

55680 60685 the crow can bring that soul back
to put the wrong things right.
106356 110360 There's a piece of glass.

114948 119452 Shelly Webster and Eric Draven.
Wedding was tomorrow night.

119536 122789 Who the fuck gets married
on Halloween anyhow?

126376 130338 Sir, we gotta move her.
- Do it.

130422 132674 All right, guys,
let's do it.

132757 135969 Devil's fucking Night.
What's the count so far?

137470 140306 They're slacking off from last year.
- Three hours to go.

140390 145270 Maybe they're just slow starters.
- Coming through!

148231 151568 You guys can't come in here
and take her away like this.

151651 156448 There are procedures. You should have
cleared this with me first.

156531 158825 Is this the victim?
- No, it's Amelia Earhart.

158867 161745 We found her, and you missed it.
- I don't care what her name is.

161828 164414 I didn't give the order to move her.
Jesus, Albrecht.

164497 167959 I can see why they took away
your gold shield.

168043 171046 Yeah, I wasn't a big enough asshole.
Come on. Let's go.

174424 177010 Shelly?
- Stand back, kid.

179262 183475 Where's Eric?
- Just don't worry about him.

183558 185769 Tell him to take care
of Sarah.

185852 189773 Look, I will.
You just, uh, lie back. Come on.

199783 202619 - You Sarah?
- Yeah.

202702 206748 Yeah, look. Your sister,
she's gonna be okay.

206790 210085 She's not my sister.
Shelly just takes care of me.
212545 216466 Her and Eric.
216508 218760 You lied to her about Eric.

220512 224224 And you're lying
to me about Shelly.

224307 226643 She's gonna die,
isn't she?

235694 241408 Now, come on.
Come on. It's okay.
241533 244953 She's gonna be fine.

263847 267892 A building gets torch ed.
All that is left is ashes.

267976 270854 I used to think that was true
about everything...
270937 275358 families, friends, feelings.

275400 279362 But now I know that sometimes,
if love proves real...

279404 283783 two people who are meant to be together,
nothing can keep them apart.

322030 325241 What are you,
like the night watchman?

346554 349933 You know, what this place
needs is a...
350016 352352 good natural catastrophe.

352435 356856 - Earthquake, tornado, you know.
- No, no, no, no.

356898 359901 Mickey, come on, man. You got to put
the mustard underneath first.
359984 362278 Maybe a flood like in the Bible.
362362 365407 Hey, hey, let me do it.

365490 369536 There we go. All right.
How about some onions?

369577 372038 Come on, man.
Don't cheap out on me.

372080 374040 - Lots of onions.
- All right, here you go.
374082 376501 Hey, all right.
376584 378962 Now we're talking.
379045 383758 Hey, it's the Sarah monster.

383842 387679 - How do you steer that on a wet street?
- Pure talent. Hi.

387762 391683 Now, Sarah, she's a genuine hot dogger.
You hungry?

391766 393560 - You buying?
- I'm buying.

393643 397313 - No onions though, okay?
- No onions?

397397 400608 - They make you fart big time.
-

406948 409659 You know, Lake Erie
actually caught on fire once...

409743 412370 from all the crap
floating around in it.
413538 417292 I wish I could have seen that.

521229 525150 - All right, we busted their machines!
- Shit!

548131 551509 Oh, oh, shit, guys.
T-bird, cop car, cop car.

558767 561353 Bad people out
on the street tonight.

567400 569319 - Damn it!
- What was that?

569402 572072 - You wait right here.
- Be careful.
572155 575450 - Mickey, call it in for me!

669377 672464 - Eric?
- Department of Housing!

672547 677052 Code violations?
Safety hazards?
677135 679346 Place looks fine to me.
679387 682223 Let's redecorate.
684726 688897 "Abash, the devil stood...

688938 691649 and felt how awful
goodness is.

691733 696321 Saw virtue in her shape, how lovely."
It's pornography.
709459 712212 No, no, no, me first.

760010 762929 - Hey, that's good.
- That's good.

766808 770395 See if you can top that, man.
Can you top that?

770478 772397 Look at that.
Look at that.

773732 778194 Here's to Devil's Night,
my new favorite holiday.

781865 783867 You go over there
and talk to your pals--

783908 787037 -
- You sick fuck.

787078 790790 Are you out of
your motherfucking mind, man?
794044 798423 Look at that!
800633 802677 Pussies drink last, man.

807766 810268 Shit ain't
even loaded, man.
810352 812520 This one is.

motherfuckers...

815607 819903 wants to bet me
this one isn't?

819986 823865 Hey, fire it up!
Fire it up!

823948 827035 - Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
- Fire it up!
827118 829913 Fire it up! Fire it up!
829996 833083 Here's your shooters.

833166 835126 - Put your guns away, huh, guys?

870537 874040 - I love you.
- Say that again.
879713 883133 Restaurant.

887804 890974 - Wow, you look great.
- Ta-da!

898023 900608 - Come here!
- No, no, no!

942400 945862 * Slipping me away from you *
947405 950950 * It doesn't matter how you hide *

you must be tired *

986611 990824 * Dreaming the crow-black dream **

take it or leave it.

1079079 1083875 * That point me to another day *

1088713 1092842 * The stretch of true realities *

1100100 1103937 * They keep calling me *
1105105 1108233 * Keep on calling me *
1110568 1113738 * They keep calling me **

1163246 1166374 What the fuck you all painted
up for, crackhead, huh?
1168960 1173214 Halloween ain't till manana.
1215215 1218635 Fuck, you murderer!

1218718 1221346 I ain't murdered nobody, man!
I don't even fucking know you!

1221429 1225517 - Man, what the fuck you want, man?
- I want you to tell me a story.

1225600 1229020 A man and a woman
in a loft a year ago.

1229062 1231648 - You're out of your fucking mind--
- Listen!

1231731 1236569 I'm sure you'll remember.
You killed them... on Halloween.

1236653 1241616 Yeah, yeah, Halloween, yeah.
Some dude, some bitch, whatever, man.

1241658 1244119 - Her name was Shelly.
-

1244202 1247205 You cut her.
You raped her.

1247288 1253086 Shelly, yeah, yeah. I shanked
her pink ass and she loved it!

1262303 1267225 Murderer? Murderer? Let me tell you
about murder. It's fun!

1267308 1271938 It's easy.
You gonna learn all about it.

1276651 1279195 I'd like you to meet
two buddies of mine.
1279279 1281948 We never miss.

1292542 1294627 - Try again!
- Aaah!

1299716 1304554 Victims.
Aren't we all?
1315523 1321404 * Sometimes it rains inside my head *
1321446 1325909 * When the words run dry *
1325992 1329245 * The walls are breathing *

1329287 1333625 - Look at this mess!
What's the world coming to?
- It's a mess.
1338797 1340924 * No, they don't have to take you *

1341007 1343760 I got to go upstairs.
Report from the front.

1343843 1348431 * No, they don't have
to take you away *

1348515 1351810 Get out of my way,
you worms!

1352936 1354854 Give me some of that
over there!

1357107 1360819 Why don't you ladies come by later?
Check me out.

1360860 1365657 Hey, guess what?
Arcade Games fell down, went boom.

1365699 1369536 - Boom.
- Can you imagine that? It's tragic.

1369619 1373832 Gather your soldiers.
You're on for tomorrow night. No sweat.

1373873 1377961 - Is the man in?
- He's taking a meeting.

1407991 1411786 You're thinking
about the past.
1414080 1416583 Dad gave me this.
1416666 1420837 Fifth birthday.

1420920 1425592 He said childhood's over
the moment you know you're gonna die.
1439481 1441941 Is she asleep?
1448156 1450408 I think we broke her.
1454412 1456539 I love her eyes.

1463380 1469511 * No, they don't have
to take you away **

1476142 1479312 Hey, kid,
get the hell outta the road!
1482357 1487028 * I don't hate them *
1487112 1490490 * But I know them *
1490573 1495161 * I don't want them hanging 'round *
1495245 1497831 * I won't roll my bones **

1497914 1503461 -
- I told you to stay out of here.

1503503 1507173 So I guess you're not gonna be home
till a lot later, huh, Darla?

1507257 1511302 She's busy. Go play with your dolls
or something, okay?
1511344 1513680 I don't have any dolls.
1513763 1517142 Get some food, huh?

1517183 1520186 Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police.

1525900 1529571 - "Somebody already bought me dinner.
The police."
-
1539581 1542834 Thirty, forty dollars.
1544586 1547047 Who the fuck is this now?

1547088 1551259 Hey! Piss off!
We're closed!

1554095 1557932 Sleep it off somewhere else, dusthead,
unless you want to get mutilated.

1565523 1569778 Goddamn creatures of the night,
they never learn.

1577452 1581831 "Suddenly I heard
a tapping, as if someone...

1581873 1585835 gently rapping,
rapping at my chamber door."
1587796 1590090 What are you talking about?
1590173 1592884 You heard me rapping, right?

1592967 1597097 You're trespassing,
and you owe me a fucking new door!

1599516 1602477 I'm looking for something
in an engagement ring.

1604020 1606356 You're looking for a coroner,
shit-for-brains.

1610610 1615740 Oh, shit.
Oh, shit on me!

1615824 1618368 Shit on me.
Shit on me!
1626835 1629087 You're not paying attention.

1634259 1639556 I repeat, a gold
engagement ring, yes?

1641182 1644644 It was pawned here a year ago
by a customer of yours named Tin Tin.

1647355 1651026 He confided in me
before he ran out of breath.
1656322 1658324 Who's this sack of shit?

1658408 1661369 That's Tin Tin, one of
T-bird's little helpers.

1661453 1664497 I think you can rule out
accidental death.

1664581 1667375 Don't any of your street demons
have real grown-up names?

1667459 1671629 This could be a turf hit, but it doesn't
look like your usual gang crap.

1671713 1676426 Come on, Albrecht, spare me.
You're a beat cop now, so be a beat cop.

1676509 1678428 I'm suppose to thank you
for that, right?

1678511 1682265 Word to the wise:
Watch your fucking mouth.

1683475 1685894 What the hell
do you call that?
1686936 1689522 I call it blood, detective.

1689606 1693401 I suppose you'll write it up
as graffiti.

1693443 1696237 You can leave
my crime scene now, okay?

1702952 1705872 - Warmer?
- What are you doing?

1705955 1708583 - Don't you know this game?
- What game?

1708625 1711544 Okay, the rings!
I'll tell you about the rings!

1711628 1716007 They're in that metal box!
It's under the shelf there!

1716091 1721596 Take the fucking rings!
Choke on them, you son of a bitch!

1725183 1727769 - Look, it goes to the attic.
- Okay.

1744661 1748873 Oh, it's beautiful.
I don't believe it.

1772772 1775692 - You have one chance to live.
- Take anything you want.

1775775 1778862 - Thank you.
- Take anything!

1778945 1781781 Now you're going to tell me
where to find...

1781865 1784492 the rest of Tin Tin's
little party pals.

1784576 1786953 The Pit. They all
hang out at The Pit.

1787037 1792125 T-birds's little potato-heads hang out
there. Funboy lives there upstairs.

1792208 1795211 - Funboy.
- Oh, baby, oh.

1795295 1799049 - A whole jolly club...
- Please!

1799132 1801885 - with jolly pirate nicknames!
- Stop! Please!

1801968 1804637 - Jesus Christ in a taxicab!
- Hold still!
1806306 1809684 Each one of these is a life...
1809768 1812270 a life you helped destroy.

1812354 1814981 I'm begging you.
Don't kill me.
1815023 1818735 I'm not gonna kill you.

1818818 1822989 Your job will be to tell the rest
of them that death is coming for them...

1831623 1835835 Tell them Eric Draven
sends his regards.

1837712 1841800 You walk outta here,
they're gonna erase your sorry ass.

1841883 1845512 You're nothing but street grease,
you motherfucker!
1845595 1847722 Is that gasoline I smell?

1869953 1873415 It's on the house, kiddo,
you know that.
1873498 1875792 One root beer.
1877794 1880547 I can't do anything.

1880630 1885093 Your mom... technically,
she's off right now.

1891891 1896813 Police! Don't move!
I said, "Don't move!"

1896855 1899899 I thought the police
always said, "Freeze!"

1899983 1903903 I am the police and I say don't move,
Snow White. You move, you're dead.
1903987 1909159 And I say I'm dead and I move.

1909200 1912537 Not one more step.
I'm serious.

1912579 1916958 Then shoot, if you will,
Officer Albrecht.

1917042 1920170 What are you, nuts?
Walking into a gun?

1922047 1925216 - You don't remember me?
- What are you talking about?

1925300 1929304 How about Shelly?
Do you remember Shelly Webster?
1929387 1932057 Shelly Webster's dead, my friend.

1932098 1936728 I want you to move over to the curb,
nice and easy. Move it!

1936770 1941608 Okay, we're gonna
wait here for backup.

1941691 1946154 - It's getting too weird for me.
- Oh, it gets better.
1946237 1948656 Do you know someone named T-bird?

1948740 1953328 He had a friend who shouldn't have
played with knives. Like the coat?

1953411 1955997 You're the guy
that murdered Tin Tin.

1956081 1959584 - Check it out.
- He was already dead.

1959668 1965006 -
- He died a year ago.
The moment he touched her.

1965090 1968760 They're all dead.
They just don't know it yet.
1968843 1971262 Get away from there!

1971346 1974474 Cops!
Get outta here!

1987737 1990323 Guy shows up looking like
a mime from hell...

1990407 1992701 and you lose him
right out in the open.

1992784 1998623 Well, at least he didn't do that walking
against the wind shit. I hate that.

1998707 2002627 Little early
for Devil's Night.
2004212 2006923 You are very restless.

2007007 2010218 Just wish I was a little
hungry again, that's all.

2010301 2014556 - Be careful of what you ask for.
- Yeah, I may get it, I know.

2026026 2029070 There are energies
aligning against you.

2029154 2031614 Seeing is believing,
isn't it?

2050759 2054721 Gideon's pawnshop just burned down
to the foundation.

2054804 2058016 Nobody cleared
this little event with me.

2058099 2059851 I didn't have nothing
to do with that.

2059934 2062604 You must be
awfully disappointed.

2062687 2066024 I got trouble.
One of my crew got himself perished.

2066066 2068360 - Yeah, who might that be?
- Tin Tin.

2068443 2073031 Somebody stuck his blades in all his
major organs in alphabetical order.

2073073 2075658 Gentlemen, by all means,
I think we ought to have...

2075742 2078912 an introspective moment of silence
for poor, old Tin Tin.

2081581 2084167 You're working for me
tomorrow night, right?

2084250 2087045 - Whatever you say, I can do.
- Good.
2087087 2089923 That's very reassuring.

2089964 2094010 I still ain't heard
why Gideon's burned down.

2094094 2098556 Is that a natural catastrophe
or act of God or something?
2098640 2100475 Call it my need to know.
2134092 2136678 Let go, you creep!

2141850 2145145 You didn't even slow down,
you dickhead!
2146563 2148940 He couldn't have stopped.

2149024 2153319 He was a buttface.
I could have made it.

2153403 2156448 What are you supposed to be,
a clown or something?

2160577 2165331 It's more like surfing than skating.
I wish the rain would stop, just once.

2166499 2170003 - It can't rain all the time.
- Eric?

2186936 2191524 Don't thank me.
Are we fighting the good fight?

2191608 2195945 Double homicide a year ago.
No convictions.
2196029 2199449 Annie... look at that.

2199532 2203745 "We, the undersigned tenants of
1929 Caulderon Court Apartments--"
2203828 2205872 What is this, a petition?

2205955 2208833 Big "kick me" sign for a very nice girl
who found herself a cause.

2208917 2213004 - The cause got her killed.
- She was fighting tenant eviction
in that neighborhood?

2213088 2218968 Shelly Webster and her nice
rock-and-roll boyfriend, Eric Draven.

2219052 2222597 The last time you snooped around a case
is when you got put back on the beat.

2222681 2226685 - I know. Torres keeps reminding me.
- I bet he does.

2233692 2237445 You're going to wind up
working a school crosswalk.

2239698 2244452 You didn't get that file from me, okay?

2244494 2246996 Ah, I owe you one!

2276776 2280655 Tomorrow night
we can get high...

2280739 2284409 and watch this whole fucking city

2302844 2306014 * I don't want to believe *

2320820 2322906 Hey, bird.
Hey, bird.
2322989 2325325 Bird. B-B-Birdie.
2325367 2327994 Here, birdie, birdie.

2328036 2331039 Come here, birdie,
birdie, birdie.
2333667 2336878 Birdie? Hey, birdie?
2341883 2343843 What the fuck?

2350225 2354771 No, man! Don't do that! You nearly
gave me a fucking heart attack!
2357065 2359943 Don't sweat it.

2361653 2364698 It's time for you to take
your bird and leave, freako.

2372622 2377460 Take your shot, Funboy.
You got me dead bang.

2379462 2384384 You are seriously fucked up.
Did you look in the mirror?
2384467 2387971 You need professional help.
2392434 2395061 He shoots! He scores!

2405196 2408908 - Jesus Christ!
- Jesus Christ?
2408992 2411703 Stop me if you heard this one.

2411786 2414706 Jesus Christ
walks into a hotel.

2420128 2422881 He hands the innkeeper
three nails and he asks...
2422964 2426509 Don't you ever fucking die?
2426593 2428845 "Can you put me up for the night?"

2434351 2438938 - Does that hurt?
- Fuck. Does it-- Fuck, does it hurt?

2441149 2445236 Look what you've done
to my sheets.

2469469 2471471 I've got a gun
in my pocket.

2474516 2477227 You're happy to see me,
aren't you?

2494994 2498873 Stay away!
Stay away from me!

2510593 2515098 Mother is the name for God
on the lips and hearts of all children.

2515181 2519936 Do you understand?
Morphine is bad for you.

2530363 2535160 Your daughter is out there
on the streets waiting for you.

2564939 2568610 If I wanted ice,
I would have asked for ice!
2568693 2570945 Now fill it up!
2572030 2575408 Fill it up yourself, macho man.
2575492 2578161 I really need this.

2586753 2590715 You burn yourself
playing with matches?

2590757 2593343 - Fuck off.
- You have an appointment.

2593426 2595887 - Well, shit on me.
- Drink up.

2595970 2598890 This is a first.
Do I bow or do I curtsy?

2598973 2601768 Get my friend here
a glass of blood.
2605355 2608274 Hey, good night, Darla.

2610694 2614406 - You stay put right there.
-
2622455 2625917 Get away, steamhead.

2657073 2662829 As you can see, I'm
on the corner of 27th and Washington...

2662871 2665623 -
- the site of last year's biggest
Devil's Night conflagration.

2665707 2668668 It was exactly one year ago
that the building you see...

2668752 2671713 across the street from me
was totally demolished by fire.

2671755 2673923 The fire that was fought
by seven fire companies...

2674007 2676134 but lost the lives
of two fire fighters.

2676217 2680972 In fact, if it weren't for the constant
surveillance by the local police--
2684059 2687562 Jesus. Don't ever do that, man.
2691566 2693735 Good likeness.

2693818 2697530 I saw your body, man.
You died. You got buried.
2697614 2699866 You still have your hat on.
2703787 2705872 I gotta sit down.
2715715 2720011 are you some kind of... ghost?

2729646 2734192 I don't know what I am. I need you
to tell me what happened to us.

2736194 2740281 You took a six-story swan dive
out of a window.
2740365 2743451 She, ah, was beaten and raped.

2743535 2748123 Died at the hospital.
Hey, you asked, man.
2748206 2750834 Come on. Read the file.

2750917 2755255 Shelly Webster held on
for 30 hours in intensive care.
2755338 2758550 Her body finally just gave it up.

2758591 2762470 I saw it.
I couldn't do jack for her.

2772355 2774274 - Hey.
- Don't touch me!

2786995 2790290 I saw her
through your eyes.

2790373 2792459 You stayed with her
the whole time.

2792542 2798006 Yeah, well, you got to
understand something, all right?

2798089 2802844 I was hoping
she'd come out of it, you know.

2802886 2805847 Give me something
I could work with.

2810685 2813188 Why didn't you do
something about it?

2813271 2816608 You think any people in that building,
even the ones who signed the petition...

2816691 2820153 would talk after
what happened to you?

2820236 2823448 I kept asking
questions and...

2823531 2826201 finally got busted for sticking
my nose where it wasn't wanted.
2830205 2832165 This your wife?

2832248 2836711 Yeah, we, uh-- Well, not anymore,
we're getting a divorce.

2841591 2845595 Little things used to mean
so much to Shelly.

2845679 2849182 I used to think
they were kind of trivial.

2849265 2852268 Believe me,
nothing is trivial.

2861903 2866366 You shouldn't smoke these.
They'll kill you.

2871037 2874249 You going to vanish
into thin air again?

2877877 2880588 I thought I'd use
your front door.

2883633 2889472 Look, man, I'm sorry as hell for what
happened to you and your girlfriend.

2900567 2904070 I got stabbed!
I shot the son of a bitch!

2904154 2907282 I watched the bullet hole
close by itself.

2907365 2910410 And then my business
gets blown up real good.

2910493 2913747 - Other than that, my day sucked.
- Yeah.

2913788 2916332 I saw him too.
He had a guitar.

2916416 2920837 He winked at me before he jumped out
a fourth-floor window like he had wings.

2920920 2925925 He winked at ya?
Musicians.

2926009 2928470 - What else did you see?
- So far I haven't heard...

2928553 2931056 shit about what you're going to do
about all this crap!

2931139 2936644 What do I get? My livelihood
got flushed and went swirling.
2936728 2939481 You ain't lost everything.

2939564 2944652 Yeah, and maybe you're not
such a big shot either! Ow! Jesus!
2944736 2948323 Fair enough. Catch.

2951951 2954371 Say hello to the last fellow
